# 2M1.

```{r}
library()
```

```{r}
N <- 21
grid <- seq(0,1,length.out=N)
prior <- rep(1, N)
likelihood = grid**3

posterior.raw <- likelihood * prior
posterior <- posterior.raw/sum(posterior.raw)
```

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_line(aes(x=grid, y=posterior))
```
